application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details submitted pursuant to ref: 22/02022/PRAB: construction management plan (5) for the prior approval for the construction of an additional  3rd and 4th floors levels above existing commercial building (former bank premises) to provide 5 new self-contained flats (3x 2-bedroom units and 2 x 1-bedroom units) total height of building 16.8m , together with installation of cycle storage units, planters & refuse storage in rear yard.
decision_conditions: Sufficient information has been provided to demonstrate compliance with the requirements of conditions (No. 5). Therefore, it is held that the submission complies with the adopted policies from the London Plan (2021), the Development Management Document (2014), Core Strategy (2010), and the National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF, 2024). Accordingly, the conditions are DISCHARGED.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LHA Maximum Height Level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 150 metres in height (492.1 feet).
LLA Maximum height level: All buildings, structures, and works exceeding 300 metres in height (984.2 feet)
